scenes.lighting: dark blue pre-dawn light through curtains
scenes.title: The Alarm
scenes.description: Catalina lies in bed under a colorful floral comforter (typical Colombian pattern with bright yellows, pinks, and blues). On the small wooden nightstand beside her bed, a smartphone screen glows brightly, displaying '6:00 AM' with an alarm ringing. A simple white lamp sits next to a framed photo of her family. The window has light blue curtains, partially open. A poster of a Colombian singer is visible on the wall.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, 1girl, young Latina woman, 21, long dark brown hair, sleepy, lying in bed, colorful floral comforter, smartphone alarm glowing on nightstand, dark pre-dawn bedroom, Colombian style room, detailed interior, high quality
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, low quality, multiple people, bright room, awake

scenes.title: Sitting Up in Bed
scenes.description: Catalina sits on the edge of her bed, bare feet touching the cool tile floor, wearing a pink cotton t-shirt and gray pajama shorts. She hunches slightly forward, rubbing her eyes with one hand, her long dark hair messy and tangled. The floral comforter is pushed aside. On the floor beside the bed are white slip-on sandals (chanclas).
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, 1girl, young Latina woman, 21, long messy dark brown hair, wearing pink t-shirt gray shorts, sitting on bed edge, rubbing eyes, bare feet on tile floor, dim morning light, Colombian bedroom, detailed interior, high quality
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, low quality, multiple people, standing, fully awake, bright room

scenes.title: Stretching by the Window
scenes.description: Catalina stands beside the window, arms raised above her head in a full-body stretch, wearing her pink t-shirt and gray pajama shorts. Her eyes are closed, face tilted slightly upward, long dark hair hanging down her back. The bed is unmade behind her. A full-length mirror on the closet door (armario) reflects her stretching figure.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, 1girl, young Latina woman, 21, long dark brown hair, wearing pink t-shirt gray shorts, stretching arms above head, standing by window, eyes closed, unmade bed behind, Colombian bedroom, detailed interior, high quality
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, low quality, multiple people, sitting, lying down

scenes.title: Choosing Clothes from Closet
scenes.description: Catalina stands before an open wooden armario with her hand reaching for clothes. Inside, casual university clothes hang on plastic hangers — jeans, t-shirts, a denim jacket, a light rain jacket. Below them, shoes are lined up: white sneakers (tenis), sandals, casual flats. She selects a white t-shirt and dark blue jeans.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, 1girl, young Latina woman, 21, long dark brown hair, wearing pajamas, standing at open wooden closet, hand reaching for clothes, jeans and shirts on hangers, bright morning light, Colombian bedroom, detailed interior, high quality
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, low quality, multiple people, dressed, empty closet

scenes.title: Clothes Laid on Bed
scenes.description: On top of the partially made bed with the floral comforter, a university outfit is laid out: a white cotton t-shirt, dark blue skinny jeans, a light gray hoodie, and white ankle socks. A pair of white sneakers (tenis) sits on the floor beside the bed. A black canvas mochila (backpack) leans against the bed frame.

scenes.title: Looking in the Mirror
scenes.description: Catalina stands before the bathroom mirror, examining her face. Her reflection shows sleepy eyes, messy dark hair in a bun, medium brown skin. Both hands rest on the white sink edge. Multiple toothbrushes in a holder (family's toothbrushes — pink, blue, green, yellow) sit to the right. A tube of Colgate toothpaste and a small potted succulent are visible.

scenes.title: Washing Face
scenes.description: Catalina leans over the sink, splashing water onto her face with cupped hands. The chrome faucet runs cold water. Her eyes are closed, water dripping from her face back into the basin. The mirror reflects her hunched back. A towel with floral embroidery hangs nearby.

scenes.title: Brushing Teeth
scenes.description: Catalina brushes her teeth, a pink toothbrush in her right hand, moving it across her teeth. Her mouth is slightly open, white toothpaste foam visible. Her reflection in the mirror shows the brushing motion. The Colgate toothpaste tube lies on its side near the sink. Her long dark hair is still in a messy bun.

scenes.title: Tying Hair in Ponytail
scenes.description: Catalina gathers her long dark hair at the back of her head, wrapping a hair elastic around it to create a high ponytail. Her arms are raised, hands pulling the hair tight. A few loose strands frame her face. The mirror reflects her focused expression. The bathroom counter shows a comb and scattered hair accessories.

scenes.title: Drying Off After Shower
scenes.description: Catalina stands on the colorful woven bath mat, wrapping a large blue towel around herself. Her hair is wet, water dripping onto her shoulders. She wraps another smaller towel (turban-style) around her wet hair. The bathroom mirror is fogged up from the shower. Steam fills the bathroom.

scenes.title: Entering the Kitchen
scenes.description: Catalina walks into the family kitchen, a warm space with cream-colored walls, colorful ceramic tiles on the backsplash (traditional Colombian pattern), wooden cabinets, and a gas stove. Her mother stands at the stove cooking arepas. Her father sits at the table reading El Tiempo newspaper. Her younger brother Daniel pours juice. Morning sunlight streams through a window.

scenes.title: Sitting at Table
scenes.description: The family of four sits around the wooden kitchen table for breakfast. Catalina sits next to her brother, across from her father. The table is full of traditional Colombian breakfast items: arepas, scrambled eggs (huevos revueltos), sliced avocado, queso fresco, bread, butter, and fresh fruit. A large thermos of hot coffee sits in the center. Everyone has a glass of fresh-squeezed orange juice.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, Colombian family breakfast, 1girl young Latina woman 21 sitting at wooden table with family, parents and brother, arepas, scrambled eggs, avocado, coffee thermos, orange juice glasses, colorful plates, bright morning, detailed interior, high quality
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, low quality, alone, empty table, dark room

scenes.title: Buttering Arepa
scenes.description: Close-up of Catalina's hands spreading butter on a hot arepa with a knife. The butter melts into the warm surface of the golden corn cake. Her plate shows the arepa, some scrambled eggs, and sliced avocado. The checkered tablecloth is visible beneath the colorful plate.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, close-up of hands spreading butter on golden arepa, melting butter, colorful plate with scrambled eggs and avocado, checkered tablecloth, Colombian breakfast, detailed food illustration, high quality

scenes.title: Eating Breakfast
scenes.description: Catalina bites into the buttered arepa. Her mouth is open, taking a bite from the edge. The golden arepa with visible melted butter is in her hands. Her coffee mug steams beside her plate. Her brother and parents eat their own breakfast around the table in a warm family scene.

scenes.title: Clearing Plate
scenes.description: Catalina stands from the table, picking up her empty plate and coffee mug. Her napkin is placed on the table. Her mother is still seated, eating and talking with the father. The table shows the remnants of family breakfast — empty arepa plate, half-full coffee thermos, scattered dishes.
scenes.character_state: finished eating, getting ready to leave

generation_settings.model: Animagine XL 3.1 or equivalent anime SDXL model

notes.scene_selection_rationale: Selected 5 scenes per location covering morning routine before university. Emphasizes Colombian family dynamics (shared breakfast, family greetings), traditional foods (arepa, café con leche), and young adult student life.
notes.vocabulary_focus: POC scenes cover approximately 50 vocabulary items across bedroom, bathroom, and kitchen locations. Focus on Colombian home life, traditional breakfast foods, family interactions, and university student morning routine.
notes.character_consistency: All scenes should maintain Catalina's core appearance: long dark brown hair (messy in morning, ponytail after getting ready), medium brown skin, athletic build, 21 years old. Pink t-shirt and gray shorts for sleep, casual university clothes after dressing.
